title: Brazil2Export Ltda
description: Brazil2Export is a cosmetics factory and worldwide exporter. I'm a Frontend Developer and IT support. I make portfolio websites about cosmetics brands, optimize SEO for better search engagement and I already made a multi-vendor e-commerce for the products.

title: Banco Bradesco SA
description: I worked at Management and Development of Real Estate Credit Products. I was in charge of managing and monitoring the issues of mortgage products. At this job I created queries on DB using SQL Server for generating contract control reports.
